moTa: The Volkswagen Beetle is available as a convertible and hatchback. The 2018 Beetle starts at $20,220 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $850. It gets EPA-estimated 29 MPG combined. The Volkswagen Beetle competes against models like the Subaru Impreza, Audi S7, and Audi A7. The Beetle is a good fit for sun lovers Sun Lover vehicles have convertible tops or removable roofs.
